title: National Day of Prayer
description: Every year our church opens its doors for anyone to come pray on the National Day of Prayer date, which is May 1st this year.  We are looking for someone to oversee this.  It would require getting word out,  contacting NDP headquarters to get prayer request cards and misc. info that is free (or the church would cover the cost if any), open the church and supervise.  If you are interested contact Cheri in the office for more info.

title: Nursery Parents Meeting
description: A brief introductory meeting for parents of nursery and preschool-aged children to meet the new nursery directors will be held following the morning service.

title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring a non-perishable food item for our local food bank.

title: Shepherd's Conference
description: Join us for the Shepherd's Conference at Discovery Alliance Church in Missoula.

title: Bitterroot Valley Living Center Ministry
description: This Sunday, March 9th, we have the opportunity to minister to the residents at BVLC. Please come and worship with these dear people at 2:30PM at BVLC.

title: Ladies Potluck Luncheon
description: More details to come, but save the date for a Ladies Potluck Luncheon on April 30th! This will be a time of fellowship and encouragement for all ladies!

title: Good Friday Service
description: Join us for a special Good Friday service as we remember the sacrifice of our Lord Jesus Christ.

title: Easter Sunday Service
description: Celebrate the resurrection of our Lord Jesus Christ with us on Easter Sunday!

title: Garden Palooza 2025
description: After church, plan on joining us for Garden Palooza. The fabulous Robin Howard will be the primary speaker. She will share tips and tricks for gardening in the Bitterroot Valley. Plan to bring a brunch dish to share.

title: Vacation Bible School
description: Save the dates for VBS 2025! Your kids won't want to miss this summer highlight!
